channel.title: tips on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in tips on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Beyond The Title
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Common Dilemma You’re only paid that much to do that much We only pay you that much if you can do only that much It’s the scenario that people measure and expect their effort should be traded into paychecks.

item.title: The Correct Way To Build Kpi
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I have taken a week off from my office, packed up and headed to Dalat for a full-week meditation retreat. This method has been my sweet escape for the past 4 years, get-away from the chaotic pop-ups, notifications, messages, deadlines from work and normal life, to find the right balance for my energy and my mind as well.

item.title: Asking As A Junior
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Switching from schooling to the working world is not easy. New people, new culture, new workflow. The urge to learn quickly, prove one’s self, and build up self-worth.

item.title: A Tips Of Hiring - Do & Don't
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Many companies out there get lured by the vision of scaling up. An unwritten rule of ’the more man we have, the better output we create’.

item.title: Startups Vs Junior Designers
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Now, before you throw bricks at me for hindering the opportunities for new aspiring designers to “explore the world”; I’m a designer myself, and I stand by my community.

item.title: Transparency
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: How much do you know about this woodland? → Is the question we all get during the first interview. Sure, if you’re lucky enough to nail the final offer; you’re likely to get a better chance on gradually discovering the company’s essential information.

item.title: Avoid Burn Out
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Just to be clear, this term has nothing to compare with the emotional crisis you go through daily - stress. No, burn-out isn’t stress.

item.title: Writing Management Objectives In Smart
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: S.M.A.R.T. goals are a relatively new idea. In 1981, George T. Doran, a consultant and former director of corporate planning for Washington Water Power Company, published a paper called, “There’s a S.

item.title: Objective
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Operating a company is not much different from operating a machine or a system. The company has departments and people working together towards a goal as a car has many components connected by gears moving towards a destination.

item.title: Resource Assignment
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: With the nature of consulting team, one member could be assigned to multiple projects at once or handle the work of a member in one project that take more than 100% of his/her time per week.
